last_episode_to_air.name: Heart (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Shadow Weaver and Catra attempt to reach Adora. Glimmer faces her father while Bow tries to evade Scorpia long enough to execute Entrapta's program.

name: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
original_name: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
overview: In this reboot of the '80s series, a magic sword transforms an orphan girl into warrior She-Ra, who unites a rebellion to fight against evil.

episodes.name: The Sword (1)
episodes.overview: Sneaking out after a training mission, Horde soldier Adora finds an uncanny sword in the Whispering Woods. Princess Glimmer wants it for the Rebellion.

episodes.name: The Sword (2)
episodes.overview: On the run from a monster, Adora, Glimmer and Bow stumble into an ancient First Ones ruin, while the Shadow Weaver orders Catra to bring Adora back.

episodes.name: Razz
episodes.overview: Glimmer concocts a plan to introduce Adora to Bright Moon, but it all goes wrong. Adora flees into the woods, where she meets an old woman named Razz.

episodes.name: Flowers for She-Ra
episodes.overview: Adora and her friends undertake a relief mission to the besieged kingdom of Plumeria. The Shadow Weaver still wants Catra to bring Adora back.

episodes.name: The Sea Gate
episodes.overview: The squad heads for the water realm of Salineas, ruled by Princess Mermista, but first they need a ship. Catra sets sail with Force captain Scorpia.

episodes.name: System Failure
episodes.overview: A recruitment trip to Dryl goes awry thanks to a virus that corrupts Princess Entrapta's robots. When Adora transforms, it infects She-Ra, too.

episodes.name: In the Shadows of Mystacor
episodes.overview: Glimmer takes Adora and Bow to the secret sorcerous realm of Mystacor for a vacation, but Adora's nightmares of Shadow Weaver persist.

episodes.name: Princess Prom
episodes.overview: It's time for the Princess Prom, hosted by Princess Frosta. Adora wants to recruit her, but friend troubles and unexpected guests get in the way.

episodes.name: No Princess Left Behind
episodes.overview: With her friends and the sword held prisoner in the Fright Zone, Adora turns to the Princess Alliance for help on a dangerous rescue mission.

episodes.name: The Beacon
episodes.overview: Everyone blames themselves for Entrapta's loss, but they're wrong about what happened. Glimmer tries to hide the glitches in her powers from her mom.

episodes.name: Promise
episodes.overview: Adora enters the First Ones citadel with Catra on her tail. Inside, they're caught in an illusion simulator that brings back painful memories.

episodes.name: Light Hope
episodes.overview: Swift Wind comes to Bright Moon, Entrapta decrypts the First Ones data crystal, and Light Hope tells Adora about the history of She-Ra and Etheria.

episodes.name: The Battle of Bright Moon
episodes.overview: Entrapta's plan to weaken the other runestones allows Catra and Scorpia to attack Bright Moon, but Adora and her friends are ready to fight back.

episodes.name: The Frozen Forest
episodes.overview: The Horde's bots attack the Woods, but the princesses can't capture one intact. Though Glimmer struggles with leadership, Catra has no such problems.

episodes.name: Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: Once they realize Entrapta is alive, Bow and Glimmer head to Dryl to rescue her. Light Hope sends Adora and Swift Wind to fix a First Ones installation.

episodes.name: Signals
episodes.overview: The squad heads to Alwyn, the Rebellion’s breadbasket: It’s been out of contact, and there are rumors it’s haunted! Entrapta sneaks into Hordak’s lab.

episodes.name: Roll With It
episodes.overview: Adora and the princesses role-play plans for retaking a Horde fortress. With Scorpia in charge, the defenders face a challenge.

episodes.name: White Out
episodes.overview: Catra, Entrapta and Scorpia head to the Northern Reach for First Ones tech. The squad follows with Sea Hawk, who’s having relationship problems.

episodes.name: Light Spinner
episodes.overview: An imprisoned Shadow Weaver recalls her past as Light Spinner, a powerful sorcerer who taught Glimmer’s father. Hordak gives Catra a deadline.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: While Catra searches for Shadow Weaver, Adora and Glimmer follow Bow home and learn that he's been lying to his family.

episodes.name: The Price of Power
episodes.overview: Shadow Weaver appears in Bright Moon, refusing to speak to anyone but Adora. As Catra awaits punishment, Entrapta pushes Hordak on the portal project.

episodes.name: Huntara
episodes.overview: The squad finds the Crimson Waste isn't uninhabited after all. Adora decides to trust Waste leader Huntara, and Hordak tells Entrapta about Horde Prime.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time in the Waste
episodes.overview: Catra and Scorpia arrive in the Waste and have no trouble fitting in. Huntara and the squad enter Mara's ship to try to view her message.

episodes.name: Moment of Truth
episodes.overview: Glimmer wants to make a raid on the Fright Zone, and her mother isn't willing to help ... but Shadow Weaver is. Adora tries to talk to Entrapta.

episodes.name: Remember
episodes.overview: Force captain Adora wakes up in the Fright Zone alongside her best friend Catra. She's convinced something's wrong, but only Scorpia seems to agree.

episodes.name: The Portal
episodes.overview: King Micah and Queen Angella are shocked by Adora's story. With time to restore reality running out, Adora turns to Bow and Glimmer for help.

episodes.name: The Coronation
episodes.overview: The day of Glimmer's coronation arrives, overshadowed by grief. Accompanied by Adora and Bow, she embarks on a quest to find the Chamber of Queens.

episodes.name: The Valley of the Lost
episodes.overview: Glimmer sends Adora, Mermista, Bow and Huntara to retrieve Mara's ship, but the Horde beats them to it. Catra meets Double Trouble, a shapeshifter.

episodes.name: Flutterina
episodes.overview: The village of Elberon throws a party for Adora, Bow and Swift Wind. A village girl named Flutterina helps when the Horde springs another trap.

episodes.name: Pulse
episodes.overview: The squad waylays a Horde transport, only to have the tables turn. While Adora hunts for a new pulse bot, Glimmer takes advice from Shadow Weaver.

episodes.name: Protocol
episodes.overview: A spore storm traps the Horde trainees in the Woods and traps Adora in the Crystal Castle, where a damaged Light Hope is forced to reboot herself.

episodes.name: Princess Scorpia
episodes.overview: Catra orders Scorpia to find Entrapta's recordings so Hordak can perfect his experimental technology. Flutterina sows dissent in the squad.

episodes.name: Mer-Mysteries
episodes.overview: After a disastrous mission, Mermista is certain there's a Horde spy in Bright Moon and vows to sleuth them out with her mystery novel experience.

episodes.name: Boys' Night Out
episodes.overview: With tensions rising between Glimmer and Adora and morale at an all-time low, Sea Hawk, Bow and Swift Wind go out for some fun. Things get out of hand.

episodes.name: Hero
episodes.overview: Razz confuses the past and the present and has trouble telling Mara and Adora apart. But Adora desperately needs her help.

episodes.name: Fractures
episodes.overview: The Princess Alliance is split on whether to use the magic at the Heart of Etheria or try to destroy it. Scorpia arrives with a request for help.

episodes.name: Beast Island
episodes.overview: Adora, Bow and Swift Wind arrive on Beast Island and make a shocking discovery. Glimmer heads to the Crystal Castle to talk to Light Hope.

episodes.name: Destiny (1)
episodes.overview: Glimmer tries to convince Scorpia to reconnect with her runestone. On Beast Island, Entrapta reveals dire new details about the Heart of Etheria.

episodes.name: Destiny (2)
episodes.overview: Catra and Hordak fight one another as Glimmer and Scorpia arrive in the Fright Zone. Adora sets off in a last-ditch attempt to stop Light Hope's plan.

episodes.name: Horde Prime
episodes.overview: Adora, Micah and the princesses search for a way to fight back and to rescue Glimmer. On Horde Prime's flagship, Catra schemes.

episodes.name: Launch
episodes.overview: While Adora takes a much-needed rest, Mermista reluctantly leads the princesses into the Fright Zone so Entrapta can try to trace Horde Prime's signal.

episodes.name: Corridors
episodes.overview: As Bow, Entrapta and Adora attempt to keep Mara's ship functional, Horde Prime orders Catra to betray Glimmer – under threat of a memory wipe.

episodes.name: Stranded
episodes.overview: Forced to land on a desolate planet to replenish the ship's fuel crystals, Adora meets three siblings on the run from Horde Prime.

episodes.name: Save the Cat
episodes.overview: Adora surrenders herself to Horde Prime, hoping to buy time for Entrapta, Bow and Glimmer to rescue Catra and hack Horde Prime's server.

episodes.name: Taking Control
episodes.overview: The team tries to keep the ship working and evade Horde Prime's pursuit. On Etheria, Micah struggles to relate to Frosta during a mission to Elberon.

episodes.name: Perils of Peekablue
episodes.overview: Mermista, Scorpia, Perfuma and Sea Hawk go undercover underwater to recruit Prince Peekablue. Netossa notices that Spinnerella is acting strange.

episodes.name: Shot in the Dark
episodes.overview: The squad heads to the planet Krytis to find a way to get past Horde Prime's blockade on Etheria. Shadow Weaver appeals to Castaspella for help.

episodes.name: An Ill Wind
episodes.overview: While Wrong Hordak's message of dissent spreads throughout the empire, the squad infiltrates the town of Erelandia to get a lead on their friends.

episodes.name: Return to the Fright Zone
episodes.overview: Adora, Catra, Perfuma and Netossa reenter the Fright Zone to rescue Scorpia while Bow and Glimmer head to the library to check on Bow's dads.

episodes.name: Failsafe
episodes.overview: A strike team infiltrates Mystacor, searching for the Heart's failsafe, the Crystal of Arxia. Entrapta and Swift Wind gather data on the chip network.

episodes.name: Heart (1)
episodes.overview: The best friend squad heads for the Heart while the princesses attack the spire so Entrapta can disrupt the chip network. Horde Prime makes his move.

episodes.name: Heart (2)
episodes.overview: Shadow Weaver and Catra attempt to reach Adora. Glimmer faces her father while Bow tries to evade Scorpia long enough to execute Entrapta's program.
